message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can start with a smaller share
I'll take a slightly larger share this time, but still a fair offer!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a decent deal
I'll try to get closer to 50/50 again, let's see if you'll accept!
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up control yet
